MPU_1.Description: Do you own a cell phone?

MPU_2.Description: How often do you carry you cell phone with you?

Levels.A3: a couple of hours a day

MPU_3.Description: How many text messages do you send a week (on average)?

MPU_4.Description: How many phone calls (using your mobile phone) do you make/take per week (on average)?

MPU_5.Description: Do you own a smartphone (iPhone, Android etc. - a multipurpose phone with internet connection)?

MPU_6.Description: Do you have a flat internet rate?

MPU_7.Description: How long have you been using a smartphone?

MPU_8.Description: Do you use your smartphone to browse the web? If yes, how often do you look up facts on your phone in a social situations?

MPU_9.Description: Do you use your smartphone to check your emails? If yes, do you get a notification each time you get a new email or do you have to check it manually?

MPU_11.Description: Do you use your phone for social networking (Facebook, Twitter, Google+ etc.)?

MPU_12.Description: Do you post messages (including tweets) to social networks using your phone (as opposed to just reading)?

MPU_13.Description: Do you use your phone instant messaging (Viber, WhatsUp, Google chat, Facebook messaging, etc.)?

MPU_14.Description: Do you use you phone to check the news?

MPU_15.Description: Do you use your phone to take and share pictures?

MPU_16.Description: In a social situation such as a dinner with friends, how often do you have an urge to check your phone (to check the news, Facebook, etc.)?

MPU_17.Description: How often do you resist this urge due to a social pressure?

MPU_19.Description: How many books do you read a year?
